name: Creates new Drupal contentÂ for new Google Sheets rows
description:
Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create content in Drupal.
[The template uses this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GkVRmhL7QLdcAj-XnrS0HdxpS0Tw1y_923dTggiidIA/edit?usp=sharing)
